DOC.brief_summary: The trial is performed to evaluate the efficacy and safety of specific immunotherapy with Grazax for treatment of grass pollen induced allergy.
DOC.brief_title: A Trial of Grazax in Subjects With Hayfever
DOC.criteria: History of grass pollen allergy Positive skin prick test to grass Positive specific IgE to grass Exclusion Criteria FEV1 <70% of predicted value
